reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

title.narrative: HAUS/Participatory Democracy Open Governance + Efficient eGovernment Services (PADOS) in EU Eastern Partnership Countries

description.narrative: The project Participatory democracy open governance and efficient e-governament services (PADOS) is implemented in the six EU Easter Partnership (EaP) countries (Armenia Azerbaijan Belarus Georgia Moldova and Ukraine).The project strengthens capacity in th e EaP countries. There will be training courses around three themes:1. Participation e-democracy open governance2. E-governance cyber security data protection3. Public management report and new leadership in complex environmentThe project is managed by HA US the Finnish Institute of public management Ltd. together with Estonian partners (Center for Development and Training of Public Service The e-Governance Academy ja Estonian School of Diplomacy).The project is implemented in 2014-2015 and its budget is 49 8.600 Euro. EU participates in the project costs by paying the travel expenses of all the EaP participants to the project events.
